mapper.select:
select count(b.sno) totSize from board b join member m on b.id = m.id where (m.nickname like '%${findStr}%' or b.subject like '%${findStr}%')
and b.nal BETWEEN '${start_day}' and '${end_day}'
and b.boardtype = '${boardtype}'

select b.sno, b.boardtype, b.subject, m.nickname, date_format(b.nal, '%Y-%m-%d') nal, b.viewcount, b.board_delete from board b join member m on m.id = b.id where (b.subject LIKE '%${findStr}%' or m.nickname like '%${findStr}%')
and b.nal BETWEEN '${start_day}' and '${end_day}'
and b.boardtype = '${boardtype}'
order by b.sno desc limit ${startNo}, ${listSize}

select m.profile_img, m.nickname, b.hashtag, b.nal, b.viewcount, b.subject, b.doc,(b.thumbup-b.thumbdown) thumbup, b.board_delete, hs.${boardtype}_horsehead horsehead from member m left join board b on m.id = b.id left join ${boardtype}_board hs on b.sno = hs.sno where b.sno = ${sno} and b.boardtype= #{boardtype}

select m.id, c.corp_logo,c.corp_name,c.manager_name,c.manager_phone,c.manager_email, b.board_delete, b.subject, b.doc, b.viewcount,b.nal,b.hashtag, b.board_delete from member m left join corperation c on m.id = c.id left join board b on m.id = b.id where b.sno = ${sno} and b.boardtype= #{boardtype}

select b.sno, mb.work_start, mb.pay, mb.corp_location, mb.position, mb.job_type, mb.required_career, mb.education_level, mb.work_type, mb.pay_date, mb.required_skill, mb.deadline, mb.main_task, mb.sub_task from board b left join mansearch_board mb on b.sno = mb.sno where b.sno= ${sno}

select m.profile_img, m.nickname, b.hashtag, b.nal, b.viewcount, b.subject, b.doc,(b.thumbup-b.thumbdown) thumbup, b.board_delete, hs.${boardtype}_horsehead horsehead, qb.qna_pixel_reward from member m left join board b on m.id = b.id left join ${boardtype}_board hs on b.sno = hs.sno left join qna_board qb on b.sno = qb.sno where b.sno = ${sno} and b.boardtype= #{boardtype}

select b.sno, m.profile_img, m.nickname, r.repl_sno, r.repl_doc, r.repl_nal, r.deep,r.repl_delete from repl r left join board b on r.sno = b.sno left join member m on r.id = m.id where r.sno = #{sno} order by r.repl_sno asc
select hashtag from board where sno = #{sno}

select m.profile_img, m.nickname, r.repl_doc, r.repl_nal, rs.repl_status from repl r left join member m on r.id = m.id left join repl_selected rs on r.repl_sno = rs.repl_sno where r.sno = #{sno} and rs.repl_status = 1

select count(r.repl_sno) totSize from repl r left join member m on r.id = m.id left join board b on r.sno = b.sno where (m.nickname like '%${findStr}%' or r.repl_doc like '%${findStr}%')
and r.repl_nal BETWEEN '${start_day}' and '${end_day}'
and b.boardtype = '${boardtype}'

select r.repl_sno, r.repl_doc, m.nickname, date_format(r.repl_nal, '%Y-%m-%d') repl_nal, r.repl_delete,b.boardtype from repl r left join member m on r.id = m.id left join board b on r.sno = b.sno WHERE (r.repl_doc LIKE '%${findStr}%' or m.nickname like '%${findStr}%')
and r.repl_nal BETWEEN '${start_day}' and '${end_day}'
and b.boardtype = '${boardtype}'
order by r.repl_sno desc limit ${startNo}, ${listSize}
